content.rendered:
Directed by Sydney Freeland. Catriona McKenzie.

Written by Amy Rardin.

Cast Vincent D’Onofrio (Wilson Fisk). Charlie Cox (Matt Murdock). Zahn McClarnon (William Lopez). Devery Jacobs (Julie). Christopher Cocke (Car Accident Victim). Alexis Capozzi (Interpreter). Leon S LaMar III (King Pin Boss Guard). Graham Greene(unknow). Chaske Spencer(unknow). Tantoo Cardinal(unknow). Cody Lightning(unknow) . Ryan Austin Bryant (Skate Rink Patron (uncredited))

Languages English. American Sign Language.

Producers Kevin Feige. Amy Rardin. Etan Cohen. Series Casting By. Sarah Finn. Krista Husar. Series Art Direction by. Lauren Abiouness. Sean Brennan. Chris Yoo. Series Set Decoration by.

Production 20th Television. Disney+. Marvel Studios.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 1

Status OnGoing (2023–)
